Title: The domino effect of good habits
Description:
Opening your eyes, you glance at the clock on the night table‚Äîtime to get up.
The house is completely silent as you make your way to the kitchen. Each sound feels amplified at this early time in the morning.
Entering the kitchen, you remember the fantastic croissant your partner bought you yesterday. It looks delicious and crispy on the outside. It must taste so good. You can‚Äôt help but wonder if you should have it.
